typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['cloudsales/dbo.Customers.parquet']) ~> source1
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['cloudstreaming/dbo.Customers.parquet']) ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(UpdatedDate = toDate('UpdatedDate', 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(CreatedDate = toDate('CreatedDate', 'MM/dd/yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(Select1@CustomerID == Select2@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
